name: Merry Christmas (Albert Mancias)
description:
Summary

You are an elf that finds themself alone in the North Pole station. Where is everyone? Traverse the station and discovery the horrible behind the disappearance of your fellow elves.

Controls

WASD - Move

Left Mouse - Interact

E - Exit Interact

F - Flashlight

Esc - Pause

Creator Note: 

I made this game as a personal project to improve my skills on narrative storytelling through level design. Still not sure if this is a good representation, but I sure learned plenty over the course of doing it.
